doc.title: buffer

value.content: A buffer is a storage in physical memory used to temporarily store data while it is being transferred from one place to another.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Data buffer on Wikipedia

doc.summary: A buffer is a storage in physical memory used to temporarily store data while it is being transferred from one place to another.
